open.title: MetroFibre outage | Boksburg
open.description: MetroFibre has informed us of a network outage affecting Boksburg, affected clients will experience no connectivity. MetroFibre engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: Our engineers are still working with Clear Access to resolve the ongoing connectivity issues. We apologise for the inconvenience.
The outage is resolved. Please reboot your router if you are still experiencing an issue.
